allow: Bash(cmd /C "set HTTP_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:7897 && set HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:7897 && uv pip install -r requirements.txt --index-url https://pypi.org/simple")
Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\); from src.main import app; print\(''Import successful!''\)")
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\); from src.main import app; print\(''Import successful!''\)")
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from src.main import app; print\(f''✓ App loaded successfully''\); print\(f''✓ App title: {app.title}''\); print\(f''✓ App version: {app.version}''\)")
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from src.main import app; print\(''App loaded successfully''\); print\(''App title:'', app.title\); print\(''App version:'', app.version\)")
